name: The World of a Mermaid
description:
Welcome in the underwater world of a mermaid, with aquatics creatures & the queen, welcome in The World of a Mermaid! That's a casual game, ideal for kids.

The main character of this game is a mermaid and you as the main character will have different uncommon tasks to do. Be prepared for the most unusual experience underwater where you will have 5 different activities as a mermaid, like taking care of the fish or even cleaning the ocean.

Game features :
- Creating a mermaid look using the most precious stones
- Giving first aid to fish in need
- Cleaning the water and releasing the fish from the fishermen's net
- Find hidden treasures
